MOTO: Connect your creativity with the World

HELLO_INFO.00: The Pixelstairs is dedicated to providing better opportunities
HELLO_INFO.01: for their works and another inspired interaction with every artist in the world.

HELP_CONTENT_UPLOAD.H3: Upload your Awwwesome Artwork to Pixelstairs
HELP_CONTENT_UPLOAD.P:
Your artwork will be posted under the terms of Pixelstairs Service
and will be subject to the Creative Commons license as stipulated.

HTTP.DEFAULT: Oops... it may be our fault.
HTTP.400: Oops... sorry, we can't do that.
HTTP.403: well... we hope you don't try that way again.
HTTP.404: Oops... this page does not exist.
HTTP.409: wait a seconds, we already working on it.
HTTP.414: whoo... the URL is too long like a Great Wall.
HTTP.415: oh no... we can't handle this format.
HTTP.422: yeah... we know it is trend or something but...
HTTP.424: It is wrong type HTTP method:developer said.
HTTP.429: gasp... please, just one by one!
HTTP.502: The Pixelstairs server is sleeping for a while.
HTTP.507: One day... we hope the users presents an awwwesome server for us.
